document.title: Hot Topic: Interest Rate Currently 10 Percent on Delinquent Taxes Collected or Administered by the State of Tennessee
document.abstract: The interest rate in effect for delinquent taxes for the fiscal year beginning July 1, 2005, and ending June 30, 2006, has been set at 10 percent, an increase from last year's rate of 8 percent.

field.name: comments
field.value:
